page.title: 12EXTRACTS FROM A NATURE DIARY
page.content: {MAY 10th 1985 There is a cool breeze. At the bottom of the garden the{Berberis Darwinni}is in full bloom. Some{sparrows}were feeding at the wild bird feeder. {MAY 12th 1985 It is very cold and there are not many insects about, but I saw a small{bee} in the Berberis. There was a{magpie}on the fence at the bottom of the garden. {MAY 13th 1985 It is a cold and windy day. A lot of the{blossom}has been blown from the trees. I found a{two spotted ladybird} on the landing window. Perhaps it has come inside to shelter from the cold. {MAY 14th 1985 Today it has been raining very hard with some thunder and lightning as well. I saw 3{seagulls}in the school playground. I also saw a{blackbird} pulling a worm from the damp grass.
